translations: （意）（歌剧、乐团等的）演出者；经理人；乐队指挥，导演

sentences.sentence: He was Zyama Karp, the impresario of the Russian Riviera restaurant.
sentences.translation: 他，季曼·卡普，是俄罗斯海滨酒家的老板。

sentences.sentence: Music impresario Simon Cowell may top the record charts with his proteges , but could only manage a modest 43 in the best-dressed list.
sentences.translation: 音乐经理人西蒙•考威尔或许因为门生众多而能够问鼎音乐排行榜，但是在“英国最具衣着品味男人”榜中他只得到一个不好不坏的43名。

sentences.sentence: I don't know if you're a fan of Seth MacFarlane, the impresario behind a succession of hit animated series like Family Guy and American Dad.
sentences.translation: 我不知道你是否是塞思·麦克法兰(Seth MacFarlane)的粉丝，他可是一系列像《居家男人》和《美国老爹》这样很受欢迎的动画片背后的掌门人。
